title: Game keeps disconnecting even though i have internet.

embed.description: I keep randomly disconnecting in game, but I'm on Skype and I am posting this right now. I ran a speed test.. everything is fine better than ever even... But I keep DC'ing. Everyone stands in place. I just lost plat 1 to this.. It's veerrryyy frustrating.

body:
I've seem multiple posts over YEARS with this same issue. The game loads in, and starts to dc randomly even though i have internet. I Never play with background applications running, and my ping and internet are good. So wtf rito? this just cost me a (Very winnable) promo game and i probably got reported for it.

feelsbadman.

replies.body: How often has this happened to you? I personally think there is a drop hack circulating as it just has happened to me. I am on a fiber connection and have never disconnected in this way until today. I also had 2 other teammates lag out while the enemy team was unaffected.

> [{quoted}](name=Archaic Mythos,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9KWYti5v,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-04-16T01:01:48.785+0000)

It doesn't happen very often, but it happens often enough. At the most odd times of the day. I usually just stop playing for the day when it happens. too tilted.
